item.title: About
item.description: I was born and grew up in Buenos Aires, Argentina, an amazing country full of wonderful people and probably the best food in the world. ðŸ™‚ Skeptical researcher. My passion this millennium is called web-security and browser vulnerabilities. I love to poke into browsers and find security-bugs on my free time (which is never enough) because itâ€™s just fun for me and of course, because I would like to help companies make a change.
